channel.title: Adventures in Dungeons and Dragons - BiteofanApple
channel.description: A transcription of the events that befall the players in our D&D 5e campaign. Updated after each session.

item.title: Kobold, and Cultists, and Dragons. Oh my!
item.description: The lucky contestants team up in a quest to save a nearby town from some Kobolds, their cultist masters, and some rats.

item.title: Our Heroes Emerge
item.description: Our journey begins not with a bang, but with a tangy, burning flesh kind of smell.
